name: yolo-agent
description: A coding agent for VS Code powered by multiple AI providers

yoloAgent.chat.enableSlashCommandAutocom.description: Enable slash command autocomplete in the chat input.

yoloAgent.chat.enableFileReferenceAutoco.description: Enable @ file reference autocomplete in the chat input.

yoloAgent.chat.enableCommandQueue.description: Allow queueing messages while the agent is streaming.

yoloAgent.chat.showContextTracker.description: Show the context usage tracker and compact-on-click control.

yoloAgent.chat.activeFileByDefault.description: Enable active file context automatically for new chats.

yoloAgent.chat.planningModeByDefault.description: Enable planning mode automatically for new chats.

yoloAgent.context.includeSkills.description: Include discovered skills in system prompt context injection.

yoloAgent.context.includeAgentsMd.description: Include AGENTS.md and rules markdown files in system prompt context injection.

yoloAgent.context.includeMemoryBank.description: Include memory-bank markdown files in system prompt context injection.

yoloAgent.context.compactionThresholdPer.description: Context usage percentage that triggers compaction checks.

yoloAgent.agent.maxToolIterations.description: Maximum tool-calling iterations per response round.
